hero.title: FELLAS BARBERS
hero.description: Excellent personal care. Combining tradition and innovation in a welcoming environment, with barbers specialized in style and confidence.

about.subtitle: ABOUT
about.heading: Fellas Barbers
about.description: Our team is made up of true masters in the art of transformation, ready to create a unique look that celebrates your individuality. We believe that every client should express their authentic essence.

services.subtitle: OUR
services.heading: Popular Services
services.allServicesSubtitle: Professional barber services with premium quality

beforeAfter.heading: Before & After

gallery.label: OUR WORK
gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Discover our transformations and the art behind each cut

footer.description: Professional experience in haircuts and beard grooming. Quality and style since always.

combo-premium.name: Premium Combo
combo-premium.detailedDescription: The Premium Combo is a complete care and wellness experience. Includes: Personalized haircut, Beard design with barbotherapy, hot towel and ozone, Facial therapy, Relaxing massage, Shaped eyebrows. And, your choice: ear and nose waxing or hair hydration. Everything designed to provide deep relaxation, healthy skin and an impeccable beard, without irritation.

haircut.name: Haircut
haircut.detailedDescription: 100% personalized haircut, with style adjusted to your profile and needs.

haircut-beard.name: Haircut & Beard
haircut-beard.detailedDescription: Haircut and beard aligned for an impeccable look.

barbotherapy.name: Barbotherapy
barbotherapy.detailedDescription: Beard treated with hot towel, ozone, facial therapy and massage. Ideal for sensitive skin and deep relaxation.

beard-premium.name: Premium Beard
beard-premium.description: Beard with hot towel and massage
beard-premium.detailedDescription: Aligned beard with hot towel and relaxing facial massage - care and sophistication for your face.

beard-simple.name: Simple Beard
beard-simple.detailedDescription: Basic beard alignment (line), ideal for maintenance and definition.

haircut-beard-eyebrows.name: Haircut, Beard & Eyebrows
haircut-beard-eyebrows.detailedDescription: Tailored haircut, well-aligned beard and defined eyebrows - everything for an impeccable look.

haircut-barbotherapy.name: Haircut & Barbotherapy
haircut-barbotherapy.detailedDescription: Personalized haircut + barbotherapy with hot towel, ozone and facial therapy for complete and relaxing care.

haircut-beard-premium.name: Haircut, Premium Beard
haircut-beard-premium.detailedDescription: Personalized haircut with premium beard, including hot towel and facial massage.

beard-fade.name: Beard with Fade
beard-fade.detailedDescription: Beard styled with smooth or sharp fade, according to your style.

beard-fade-contour.name: Beard Fade & Hair Contour
beard-fade-contour.detailedDescription: Beard with fade and hair contour for a detailed and well-defined finish.

hair-contour.name: Hair Contour
hair-contour.detailedDescription: Hair contour and finishing for a clean and defined look.

eyebrows.name: Eyebrows
eyebrows.detailedDescription: Eyebrow shaping to enhance your look with symmetry and precision.

head-shave.name: Head Shave
head-shave.detailedDescription: Cut with just 1 clipper guard, ideal for those seeking practicality and clean style.

head-shave-beard.name: Head Shave & Beard
head-shave-beard.detailedDescription: Head shave (does not include fade), optional wash. Beard with size adjustment, volume, machine fade, razor contours and revitalizing aftershave.

hair-hydration.name: Hair Hydration
hair-hydration.detailedDescription: Nourishing treatment that restores shine, softness and health to the hair.

beard-hydration.name: Beard Hydration
beard-hydration.detailedDescription: Hydration treatment to leave the beard softer and healthier.

facial-cleansing.name: Facial Cleansing
facial-cleansing.detailedDescription: Deep exfoliation and hydration to remove impurities and revitalize the skin.

hair-therapy.name: Hair Therapy
hair-therapy.detailedDescription: Treatment focused on scalp health and hair strengthening, combating hair loss, oiliness or dryness.

anti-dandruff-therapy.name: Anti-Dandruff Hair Therapy
anti-dandruff-therapy.detailedDescription: Specific treatment to combat dandruff and balance the scalp.

hair-pigmentation.name: Hair Pigmentation
hair-pigmentation.detailedDescription: Hair pigmentation with water-based dye is a service that darkens or evens out the color of the hair. Ideal for covering gray hair, filling in gaps or changing hair tone.

beard-pigmentation.name: Beard Pigmentation
beard-pigmentation.detailedDescription: Beard coloring to correct gaps, even out color and enhance the look.

nose-waxing.name: Nose Waxing
nose-waxing.detailedDescription: Hygienic and discreet removal of nose hair.

waxing-combo.name: Waxing Combo (Nose & Ear)
waxing-combo.detailedDescription: Removal of unwanted hair in a hygienic and discreet way, promoting cleanliness and aesthetics.

haircut-student.name: Haircut (Student)
haircut-student.detailedDescription: Personalized haircut with special price for students, without compromising on style. (Valid student card required)

haircut-beard-student.name: Haircut & Beard (Student)
haircut-beard-student.detailedDescription: Aligned haircut and beard, designed for students seeking practicality and modern look.

sealant.name: Sealant
sealant.detailedDescription: Treatment that seals the hair, reduces frizz and provides shine and prolonged protection.

haircut-beard-sealant.name: Haircut, Beard & Sealant
haircut-beard-sealant.detailedDescription: Personalized haircut and beard with sealant finish for shine, protection and durability.

botox.name: Botox
botox.detailedDescription: Hair botox treatment for reconstruction and revitalization of the hair.

highlights.name: Highlights
highlights.detailedDescription: Strand-by-strand coloring technique to create natural and modern highlight effects.

platinum.name: Platinum
platinum.detailedDescription: Hair bleaching to achieve light and modern tones, striking and current.

image-consulting.name: Image Consulting (Visagism)
image-consulting.detailedDescription: Complete facial analysis to recommend the haircut and style that best suit your identity and personal features.

courtesy-haircut.name: Courtesy Haircut
courtesy-haircut.detailedDescription: Courtesy haircut service upon prior consultation.

barbershops.label: OUR
barbershops.title: Barbershops
barbershops.subtitle: Visit our units in Lisbon and discover the unique atmosphere of each space
